reviews.review: Counter-Strike: Source is legendary and deservingly so. It's fast paced, and engaging. Fun, and exciting this is an excellent game. It develops creativity, teamwork, intensity and lots of laughs in both winning and losing. The audio of the weapons are accurate and the options are varied and useful in game play. The maps are detailed with lots of nooks and crannies for cover, or wide open spaces for one on one combat. Be it in full on attack or patient ambush, this game is great fun and makes good times. Great to learn, better to master and satisfying to teach by combat.I highly recommend this game.

Would you recommend this game to other players?

Yes I would.
